title: Net 7.0 FastReport SkiaSharp
body:
### Description


I have a net 7.0 application and I'm trying to implement FastReports with Docker for Linux.

There is a problem when reporting.Prepare();

{
  "status": 500,
  "message": "Exception in BuildFontRuns() with original length 35 now 35, style run count 1, font run count 0, direction substitutions: False -> Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'asset ')"
}
